olac:olac.dc:title: Language: An introduction to the study of speech
olac:olac.dcterms:issued:
2000 Sapir, Edward The noted linguist and anthropologist Edward Sapir wrote this work to show language in relation to other fundamental interests--the problem of thought, the nature of the historical process, race, culture, art. This book is not only a study of language and culture, but ultimately on the world of relations and influence.
